#Text= Iroh says : " I was prepared to deal with Sato 's mecha tanks , but not these new high - speed aircraft .

column1: #Text=Every time we think we have an advantage , Amon outsmarts us .
#Text=" Bolin says : " No matter what our plan is , he always has a better one .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Amon is winning so far , but we 're not out of the fight yet .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I like this man 's confidence !
#Text=So , how are we not out of the fight ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " A second wave of reinforcements is on the way , but I need to warn them .
#Text=Do you still have a way to get a message out ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I know just the man for the job .
